title: Donna Parker, Special Agent
description: The summer is over and it is time for Donna and Ricky to go back to Summerfield Junior High.Donna and Ricky spend less time together as they have different responsibilities. Ricky pursues her dramatic talents whilst Donna joins the school newspaper, quickly becoming elected as assistant editor.Soon things take a turn for the mysterious. Donna's long-lost uncle appears in Summerfield, a thinks he is being spied on, her friends begin to ignore her, and a strange character is employed at Summerfield Junior High.Little does Donna realize that an exciting trip to New York City will reunite her with old friends and solve each of the mysteries.
author: Marcia Martin
